title: 【學生宿舍】112學年第二學期電費階段公告 【Student Dormitory】Electricity Charge Announcement for 2023-2024 Academic Year

content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212

標題： 【學生宿舍】112學年第二學期電費階段公告 【Student Dormitory】Electricity Charge Announcement for 2023-2024 Academic Year
日期： Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:34:38 +0800

各位住宿生大家好：

1. 112學年第二學期電費計費期程共四階：
    (1) 第一階段: 2024/02/19 - 2024/03/31
    (2) 第二階段: 2024/04/01 - 2024/04/30
    (3) 第三階段: 2024/05/01 - 2024/05/31
    (4) 第四階段: 2024/06/01 - 2024/06/24
2. 各莊電費請自行上網查詢。https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx 每階段電費計算後，學校將公告提醒複查期程，屆時如對該階段電費有疑慮，請務必於該階段複查期程間填寫複查表，經宿舍管理員確認後辦理，如未於期限內提出或提出後查證無誤，將依公佈結果辦理。

https://rb005.ndhu.edu.tw/p/404-1005-219574.php

學務處生活輔導組


Dear dormitory residents,

The electricity charges of Student Dormitory are calculated by 4 periods
1st Period：2024/02/19 - 2024/03/31
2nd Period：2024/04/01 - 2024/04/30
3rd Period：2024/05/01 - 2024/05/31
4th Period：2024/06/01 - 2024/06/24
2、Please check your bill information on-line. https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx

After the calculation of electricity charges for each stage, the school will announce the reassess schedule. If you have doubts about the electricity charges for that stage, please be sure to fill in the reassess form during the reassess period of that stage, and handle it after confirmation by the dorm manager. If you do not reassess it within the time or if it is verified that it is correct after submission, it will be handled according to the announced results.

3、For any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at 03-8906217.
